meanings.definition: The quality or state of being mountainous.
meanings.sent1: The mountainousness of the landscape made hiking difficult.
meanings.sent2: The mountainousness of the region provided stunning views.
meanings.sent3: The mountainousness of the terrain made the hikers feel like they were climbing giants.
meanings.sent4: The mountainousness of the area loomed over the valley like a protective wall.
meanings.sent5: The mountainousness of the terrain was both breathtaking and challenging.

meanings.definition: The extent to which an area is covered by mountains.
meanings.sent1: The mountainousness of the country attracted many climbers.
meanings.sent2: The mountainousness of the region made it perfect for skiing.
meanings.sent3: The mountainousness of the landscape made it seem like a giant playground.
meanings.sent4: The mountainousness of the area cast long shadows over the valleys.
meanings.sent5: The mountainousness of the terrain was a sight to behold.
